name: Double Fine's MASSIVE CHALICE
blurb: A tactical strategy PC game on an epic fantasy timeline from the creators of Psychonauts, Br\u00fctal Legend, and Iron Brigade!

rewards.reward: THE GAME =============================\r\nDownload MASSIVE CHALICE for Windows, Mac, and Linux, DRM-free and on Steam.  Plus you'll get a special backers-only badge on the official Double Fine forums and your name will be listed in the "Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS in the game and on the official website!

EXCLUSIVE BACKER RELIC, and EXTRA DIGITAL COPY ============================= Start your first heroic generation with an awesome in-game backer-exclusive relic, to be designed by you and the community in the MASSIVE CHALICE forums! You'll also receive a second digital copy of MASSIVE CHALICE, through Steam or as a DRM-free download! Your name will grace the "Relic Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS. + All previous rewards.

EARLY ACCESS, HD BEHIND-THE-SCENES, ART, and SOUNDTRACK ============================= Early access to the game via Steam, exclusive downloadable HD versions of the public 2PP Behind-The-Scenes videos, a hi-res digital art package, and a digital copy of the MASSIVE CHALICE original soundtrack! Your name will be permanently displayed in the "Super Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS. + All previous rewards.

SPECIAL EDITION BOXED COPY\r\n============================= \r\nReceive a MASSIVE CHALICE special edition box containing the game on disc for Windows, Mac, and Linux, and covered by a backer-exclusive cover designed by Cory Schmitz! Your name will be featured in the "Special Edition Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS! + All previous rewards.

ADD YOUR NAME and LEGACY to MASSIVE CHALICE ============================= Immortalize yourself in the world of MASSIVE CHALICE! Submit your name and House preferences (color, sigil, motto, and castle name) to be included as one of the Bloodlines in the game! Your lineage will be immortally recorded in the "Bloodline Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS. NOTE: This tier now includes a physical box from the previous tier so international shipping now applies. + All previous rewards.

ADD YOUR NAME and LEGACY to MASSIVE CHALICE
============================= 
Immortalize yourself in the world of MASSIVE CHALICE!  Submit your name and House preferences (color, sigil, motto, and castle name) to be included as one of the Bloodlines in the game!
                      
Your lineage will be immortally recorded in the "Bloodline Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS.

+ All previous rewards.

EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT and POSTER ============================= Get an exclusive limited edition MASSIVE CHALICE t-shirt and poster designed by Cory Schmitz! Your name will forever adorn the "Collector Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS. + All previous rewards.

SIGNED POSTER ============================= Have your poster signed by Tim, Brad, and MASSIVE CHALICE team members! Your name will be interminably inked upon the "Signature Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS. + All previous rewards.

PLAY and FEEDBACK SESSION at DOUBLE FINE or SKYPE with BRAD\r\n ============================= \r\nVisit Double Fine's office in San Francisco where you will be one of the first to play an early build of  MASSIVE CHALICE on-site!  Give your feedback, thoughts, and rants directly to the development team over lunch! Can't make it to San Francisco? Have a Skype or Google Hangout session with MASSIVE CHALICE lead Brad Muir about the game or anything else on your mind. Your name will be permanently affixed to the "First Players" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS. (Transportation and lodging not provided) + All previous rewards.

DESIGN TEAM MEETING\r\n ============================= \r\nContribute to an early MASSIVE CHALICE design meeting either at Double Fine's San Francisco studio or via Skype or Google Hangouts! We'll prep you with background info and you'll participate in the brainstorming, problem solving, and wise-cracking! Your contribution will be evermore inscribed in the "Design Consultants" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS.  (Transportation and lodging not provided) + All previous rewards.

GAME NIGHT at DOUBLE FINE ============================= Exclusive invitation to an epic MASSIVE CHALICE BOARD GAME NIGHT with Tim, Brad, and the team at Double Fine's studio! We'll roll d6s, duel decks, maneuver miniatures, and dine on excellent San Francisco fare! Your name will be forever emblazoned in the "MASSIVE PATRONS" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS. So, what do you want to play next? (Transportation and lodging not provided) + All previous rewards.
